com.storytron.swat

Class ScriptTreeCellRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JLabel
            • javax.swing.tree.DefaultTreeCellRenderer
              • com.storytron.swat.ScriptTreeCellRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants, javax.swing.tree.TreeCellRenderer

    public final class ScriptTreeCellRenderer
extends javax.swing.tree.DefaultTreeCellRenderer
implements TreeCellRenderer
    A class for drawing script tree nodes.

    Displays operator labels and node descriptions.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • setShowDescriptions

        public void setShowDescriptions(boolean showDescriptions)

      • getShowDescriptions

        public boolean getShowDescriptions()

      • getHeight

        public int getHeight(TNode n)
        The height of the node is the one of a JLabel if the node does not have a description label or has but it is collapsed. Otherwise it is twice as high.

      • getWidth

        public int getWidth(TNode n)
        The width of the node is the one of the label being displayed. If there is more than one label to show, the width is the maximum of the label widths.

      • getTokenLabelWidth

        public int getTokenLabelWidth(TNode n)

      • getTokenLabel

        public static java.lang.String getTokenLabel(TNode n)
        Construct the label for a given node.

      • getTreeCellRendererComponent

        public java.awt.Component getTreeCellRendererComponent(Tree tree,
                                                       TNode value,
                                                       boolean hasFocus)
        Constructs the Component to draw for a given node. This comes from the interface TreeCellRenderer.
        Parameters:
        tree - The tree in which value is stored.
        value - is the node to draw.
        hasFocus - whether the node has focus or not.
        Returns:
        The component which paint method should be called to make the drawing.

      • getComponent

        public java.awt.Component getComponent()
        Returns:
        the component that is to be reused to draw each node.
